A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Anyone who understands the underlying premise of what it means to master the Force\, will realize that Luke Skywalker (a Jedi Master) should not be portrayed as a petulant\, Goth tween. I can put up with the unnecessary plot twists\, the quick dismissal of certain pivotal characters\, etc.\, but Luke plays a central role in the development of this movie. Thus\, his portrayal (which was roundly criticized by the actor himself) ruins what would otherwise have been the capstone of the Star Wars franchise.
